code: import React from'react';import{activityData}from'../../data/healthData';import'../../styles/ActivityFeed.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ActivityFeed=()=>{const maxValue=Math.max(...activityData.map(item=>item.value));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"activity-feed",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Activity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"activity-summary",children:"3 appointment on this week"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-chart",children:activityData.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bar-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-bar",style:{height:"".concat(item.value/maxValue*100,"%"),backgroundColor:index%2===0?'#62e0a3':'#5b6acf'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"day-label",children:item.day})]},index))})]});};export default ActivityFeed;
